name: Project Hollywood
description:
Description

Take the role of Max Power, a third-rate actor trying to make a name for himself  in the film industry.

Live through the most intense and extreme action sequences known to man, but always make sure to follow the script!

Controls How the theme fits

"Brackey's gamejam 2020" entry.  We took the "rewind" concept and applied it to the core of the gameplay. Whenever you don't follow a sequence properly, the tape will be run back and you'll have to do it again until you go through all the items on the script, to your director's contempt.
